content: Are there any open source or commercial products that implement all or part of the Argonaut Scheduling Implementation Guide?

We had polled the Argonaut community earlier this year and nobody had implemented at that time. We will ask again this year but I suspect that status will be unchanged for a variety of reasons such as STU3 vs R4 support. We have discussed updating the status of Argonaut guides to indicate the level of community support.

Epic has implemented the provider-based scheduling use case from that IG. We've implemented both the client and server roles. Currently, it's only Epic-to-Epic since to our knowledge nobody else has implemented it, but our intent was to build something that could be used Epic to non-Epic once other implementations exist.
